name: woman getting haircut: medium-dark skin tone

bn:00001530n: A woman is a female human.
An animal of the sex that produces eggs.
An adult human member of the sex that produces ova and bears young.
An adult female person (as opposed to a man)

bn:00042548n: The way someone's hair is cut.
The style in which hair has been cut

apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji captures a woman with a medium-dark skin tone receiving a haircut, with the stylist's scissors delicately positioned near her hair, all rendered with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading. The scene is depicted with realistic lighting, highlighting the smooth, rounded edges of the figures and conveying a sense of gentle transformation. This visual on Apple devices is a dynamic and modern way to communicate changes, makeovers, or simply a trip to the salon, imbued with Apple's characteristic attention to detail.
